articles.description: Junior Robinson scored 30 points, including a pair of clinching free throws as Mount Saint Mary's rebounded from a pair of setbacks and defeated Sacred Heart 74-69 on Saturday to remain in the running for a top seed in the upcoming Northeast...
articles.headline: Robinson helps Mt. St. Mary's rebound, 74-69 at Sacred Heart

articles.description: While Texas buoyed its tournament hopes with a season sweep, Oklahoma is falling toward the bubble watch after its eighth loss in 10 games.
articles.headline: Oklahoma in freefall after eighth loss in 10 games

images.caption: Trae Young had 26 points on Saturday, but it took 21 shots as Oklahoma lost its fifth game in a row.
images.name: Texas-Oklahoma-Trae Young [576x324]

articles.description: Alabama's John Petty drives to the paint and delivers a lob to Donta Hall, who throws down a thunderous one-handed alley-oop dunk.
articles.headline: Hall reaches back for emphatic alley-oop

images.caption: Alabama's John Petty drives to the paint and delivers a lob to Donta Hall, who throws down a thunderous one-handed alley-oop dunk.
images.name: Hall reaches back for emphatic alley-oop

articles.description: Jamaal King scored 23 points, Malik Harmon tossed in a season-high 21, the two had but one turnover between them and Saint Francis University defeated Bryant 89-56 on Saturday for its third-straight win and clinched a spot in the Northeast Conference...
articles.headline: King, Harmon lead Saint Francis (Pa) past Bryant 89-56

articles.description: Jaren Jackson Jr. gets the pass in space under the basket and slams it home with two hands to cut the Spartans' deficit to 19.
articles.headline: Jackson trying to mount MSU comeback

images.caption: Jaren Jackson Jr. gets the pass in space under the basket and slams it home with two hands to cut the Spartans' deficit to 19.
images.name: Jackson trying to mount MSU comeback

articles.description: Bubba Parham scored 25 points with four steals, Myles Lewis added 11 points, and VMI held off The Citadel 75-71 on Saturday to end a five-game skid and snap a two-game losing streak against the Bulldogs.
articles.headline: VMI holds off The Citadel behind Parham's 25 points

videos.description: Tigers head coach Will Wade discusses how the guards influenced the game and his outlook on postseason play.
videos.headline: Guard play key in LSU's win vs. Arkansas

videos.description: Guard Tremont Waters notches a 27-point, 11-assist double-double to help the Tigers improve to 13-9 overall.
videos.headline: Waters leads LSU past Arkansas 94-86
